name: Divnozemye
description:
Divnozemye is a card game like the famous game "Arcomage" (from "Might&Magic"), but in the setting of folk fairy tales and with its own feature - heroes. In this game, two players take turns making moves using one of the cards from their “hand”. Each player has 6 cards in his “hand”. Each card costs one of three types of resources and performs the action that is written on it. The player can only play the card for which he has enough resources. If a player cannot play any cards, then he or she can discard one of them. For discarding, the player can receive some kind of bonus depending on his hero.
The player can win in any of three ways:
1) Build own tower to the maximum height
2) Destroy the opponent's tower
3) Collect one of three resources to the maximum

Game Features:

1) More than a 100 different beautiful cards
2) Stylization of folk tales
3) 11 character-heroes from folk tales: Ilya Muromets, Ivan Tsarevich, Vasilisa the Wise, Koschey the Immortal and others
4) 9 backgrounds
5) Campaign of 15 levels
6) 3 levels of computer opponent difficulty
7) Ability to play with a friend on the same screen
